articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: NSA Doval meets with top Chinese diplomat Wang Yi in South Africa | Mint - Mint
articles.description: During the meeting, NSA conveyed that the situation along the LAC in the Western Sector of the India-China boundary since 2020 had eroded strategic trust and the public and political basis of the relationship
articles.content: National Security Adviser Ajit Doval met with Chinas top foreign policy official Wang Yi on the sidelines of the BRICS NSAs Meeting in South Africa on Monday. Wang Yi, who serves as Director of the C… [+1776 chars]
